name: The Unclear Journey
description:
The Unclear Jouney is a first-person simulation game. 

We play as Kyle, a young man who likes to party. After a big party last night, we wake up with a big headhake, To top it all of, we can't find our DAMN GLASSES!!!

This game was made in 48 hours on the Global Game Jam 2021. 

We were a group of 5:

Ricardo Oliveira: Lead 3D artist, Game Designer and Level Designer.

Gustavo Maldonado: Lead Programmer, 3D artist and Level designer;

Gonçalo Indi: Programmer, UI designer and Writter;

Luana Baía: Character Designer and artist;

Gonçalo Reis: Sound Designer and Voice-actor;
